topics.title: Read this before posting
topics.fancy_title: Read this before posting
topics.excerpt:
This is a semi-public forum for participating in Ethereum’s research efforts, including but not limited to: 

Proof-of-Stake
Scaling solutions
EVM improvements
Low-level protocol improvements
Economics

protocol economic…
